website_summaries.verdict: A digital precision scale that can handle up to 2,600 grams and comes with a sturdy stainless steel top.
pros: Auto-shutoff feature can be adjusted or turned off
Works the way it's supposed to work
cons: Other scales are able to weigh to a more precise level

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Easy to Use with quick response
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, it was calibrated and ready to use. I use the ac power cord. As others have reported: Very easy to read and use. I use it several times daily and repeatedly change out material and containers. The scale has a very quick response time, so I'm not waiting on it between measures. I would recommend this to anyone needing the range and features this has. I was concerned about the shipping, but when it arrived it was very well packed by amazon and the manufacturer original packaging is superb. So, with that, it has two layers of protection.
customer_reviews.author: tag_rrgj

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it's cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I have used this scale less than 10 times and the digital panel become slightly detached (unglued) and some of the powders I was weighing got behind the digital display. Seems like it's cheaply made. Otherwise I was happy with it. After emailing the company, they sent me another one within a week except that the new one would not stabilize itself on zero, the stainless steel top is wobbly and crooked on the plastic base. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RBS

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase, EXCELLENT accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I use and abuse my scale, so much so that as my business expands I needed a second one for optimum work flow. No hesitation I ordered the exact same model as I already use. Super accurate, fast to calibrate and set up. Can not rave enough about how great this scale is.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen C.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Accurate, easy to use, durable. Bought this to replace our I700 version and this is much better. Only thing I would change, is to include a hi ged lid, like the i700 has. Helps keep it clean. Great scale thpugh, and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: They last and work perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for years in different locations where I live. This is a tried and true product that works perfectly and has been around for a long time. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lscoop

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baking needs. I purchased this for the constant backlit display and AC adapter, and I am very pleased with it. I disabled the auto-off feature and only use the power button. The platform is large enough for a mixing bowl, although I tend to weigh the dry and liquid ingredients in separate containers. It's small enough to leave on the kitchen counter, but when not in use, it's protected in a plastic bread bag.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. I returned two ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I returned two cheap scales that said they were accurate to .01g. Both of them were under 20 bucks. Although this was 5 times as expensive, it weighed things accurately right of the the box. I will say though, I tried to contact my weigh about replaclacing a piece I had on their palm scale and they did not reply. So, I'm a bit leery of the customer service, but that palm scale has worked for 20 years without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Team Su

customer_reviews.title: This scale is very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This scale is very accurate. It is electric and plugs into the wall so I don't have to rely on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Great product, accurate right out of the box as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, accurate right out of the box as confirmed by the old spare change calibration check. Loving the .1 gram accuracy, the led display is sweet, had a kd8000 before this that I returned because needed more accuracy. This is a great scale for the money
customer_reviews.author: David Henao

customer_reviews.title: Product performs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for weighing ingredients for pizza and other baking. Reliable, battery seems to last forever
customer_reviews.author: RSASWFL

customer_reviews.title: Works great,
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the triple-beam scale I was using for Ceramic glaze-making. So easy.
customer_reviews.author: AZ shopper

customer_reviews.title: I love this scale
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale. I use it to make cold press and milled soap in small batches. Exact measurement in grams helps me be more accurate and improves the quality of my product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gehrie

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent scale.
customer_reviews.text: Calibration was spot on right out of the box. I am very pleased with this scale.
customer_reviews.author: citizen K

customer_reviews.title: Nice, accurate scale for the price
customer_reviews.text: I do applied academic research and was looking for something affordable that would stand up to weighing dirt-covered plant parts. This scale was great for this purpose. Although the weigh plate was not large enough, it was easy to use a lightweight plastic platter to enlarge the weighing area. The scale is accurate to a tenth of a gram and met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied with the product an fast service
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Totally satisfied with the product an fast service. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Shelton

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR HOME BUSINESS OR THE KITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: I have already used several of the units of measurement and functions that is intrinsic to this scale. My company paid several times more for a scale that does the same thing. Calibration right out of the box was spot on. Grain, oz.,& counting functions were accurate to .01%. Agreat scle fo the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to use to mix ceramic glazes and it works wonderfully. In the past
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use to mix ceramic glazes and it works wonderfully. In the past, I have only used a triple beam balance, and I must admit that this is faster. The scale is easy to level, has good instructions, and tared out perfectly using a calibration weight. It appears to be accurate enough for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Poor potter

customer_reviews.title: I like the big top for throwing meat On it when separating the 10 pound roll of hamburger.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it’s off a little bit but not enough to make a big difference when you’re cooking.
customer_reviews.author: ethan eckelbarger

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Item works exactly as advertised and has performed flawlessly for months now. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and well made. I did not notice that it has levelers and needs to be leveled prior to using. Other than that minor inconvenience I would have rated it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Armbruster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. My husband uses it to measure flour for his bread making.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki Igler

customer_reviews.title: every time my friends see it they want one BEST SCALE FOR THE JOB
customer_reviews.text: 3rd one i order ... every time my friends see it they want one BEST SCALE FOR THE JOB..........very precision. remember you must calibrate it every time recommend getting calibration weight set for this item ..
customer_reviews.author: vudookie

customer_reviews.title: solid, easy to use, accurate
customer_reviews.text: I use it a lot, for mixing ceramic glazes. It's easy to use, easy to read, and accurate to a tenth of a gram. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: yard dog

customer_reviews.title: not too accurate
customer_reviews.text: not accurate enough. repeatability seems to be closer to +-.3g
customer_reviews.author: publicname

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Get a calibration weight set for more accurate readings.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good Scale
customer_reviews.text: Scale works great, very accurate every time. I like the leveling feature...and its LED display is easy to see and read.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price and performed as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Shipment arrived without damage and on time. Excellent product for the price and performed as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I'm a soapmaker, and I replaced an older My Weigh scale with this one. It is probably more precise than most soapmakers would need--a tenth of a gram can be a little crazy-making, when it comes to precision. It has a bubble level, which is handy. Works with either a power supply (recommended for soapmaking) or batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Anne L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: A weighty proposition
customer_reviews.text: After weighing all the options, I purchased this excellent scale and it has worked well for me. Does everything you could ask from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McLarnon

customer_reviews.title: Not legal for trade
customer_reviews.text: Not really legal for trade in the state of Minnisota.If you don't buy or sell precious metals this is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the wrong scale. When it arrived, ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong scale. When it arrived, I could not believe I could weigh myself on such a tiny scale. I finally realized my mistake and ordered the My Weigh I was used to--looking at my old one that no longer worked, I ordered the XL-440 talking scale. See below. I was not aware that My Weigh made more than the one scale I was familiar with. Rosalia Poynter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: My Weigh SCM2600BLACK iBalance 2600 Table Top Precision Scale
feature_bullets: 2600 gram capacity x 0.1 gram resolution Plus ounce, pound, troy ounce, pennyweight, carat and grain modes
Tare, calibration, programmable Auto-off and counting functions
Stainless steel platform and bright backlit display

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
